ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
  b = source.getKey();
  url1 = String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
  page = String(java.ajax(url1)).match(/\(第1\/(\d+)页\)/)[1];
  url2 = String(url1).replace(/(\d+).html/,"$1_"+page+".html");
  url = b+java.ajax(url2).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">下一节<\/a>/)[1];
  java.put('url',url);
result=java.ajax(url);
}
result
</js>.RBGsectionThree-content p@textNodes

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[];
base = source.getKey();
lis=java.getElements('section .BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a');
for(i in lis){
	url=lis[i].attr('href');
	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
12.24更新2.2
更换解析接口

12.23更新2.1
1.新增登录后的搜索接口
2.更改cookie保存形式

11.27更新2.0
1.新增登录功能，可同步歌单
2.新增收藏创建功能，可填入拷贝的书籍详情页url，songId值，playlistTid值，歌单链接等
①单曲和歌单均为非空：添加歌曲到已创建目标歌单;
②单曲非空歌单为空：收藏单曲到我喜欢;
③单曲为空歌单非空：收藏目标歌单
④删除歌单请到发现页-我的创建里拷贝目标歌单书籍url

1.支持搜索单曲，支持发现歌单
2.登录UI可切换音质
3.建议使用3.24beta版阅读，3.25正式版有bug
by_tlyanyu

bookSourceComment:
修改：1、评论评分改为登录页填写；2、优化搜索结果获取，增加相关排序；by：xiaohan231-2025/01/06

修改：1、修复封面加载；by：xiaohan231-2025/01/02

修改：1、优化详情评论显示；2、增加登录页按钮自适应宽度；by：xiaohan231-2024/12/26

修改：1、优化详情书评显示和评论上传；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/26

修改：1、优化登录页源站链接输入；2、增加详情书评显示和评论上传；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/25

修改：1、详情和目录链接改用Data URL；2、增加下拉书架更新并发限制；3、增加更新网址后，刷新书架自动替换详情和目录源站；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/10

修改：1、修复访问异常验证；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/09

修改：1、增加XH发布页订阅源变量和登录页激活码两种激活方式；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/21

修改：1、修复UAA搜索，增加分类列表匹配；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/20

修改：1、优化登录函数；2、增加取向参数切换；3、增加网址发布页链接；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/17

修改：1、优化发现标签；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/10

修改：1、优化Url(e)、Map(e)函数；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/09

修改：1、重写发现；2、增加自定义源站，留空为官方网址；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/05

修改：1、优化正文规则；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/02

修改：1、修复目录；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/28

修改：1、移除字体解密函数；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/27

修改：1、优化书籍目录获取，从网页css中取值判断假章节；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/26

修改：1、目录api失效，重新修复书籍目录；2、移除目录假章节；3、修复书籍目录分卷信息错误；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/25

修改：1、增加字体解密；2、修复书籍详情；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/19

修改：增加附加标签搜索（搜索时可使用  关键词@@标签  来进行附加标签搜索。 前面为搜索的关键词 ，@@后面的是标签，多个标签之间用 逗号( ,， )隔开。关键词留空可直接搜索标签）；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/17

修改：1、添加人机验证；2、优化正文规则；3、移除默认token；4、正文人机验证添加进程锁，以防止同时弹出多个人机验证；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/16

修改：修改源域名；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/10

修改：修复正文获取；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/10

修改：修复发现；by：xiaohan231-2024/09/03

修改：修复正文请求有时候没有添加请求头的bug；by：xiaohan231-2024/07/27

修改：修改书源接口；by：xiaohan231-2024/07/26

修改：添加登录和章节购买；by：xiaohan231-2024/07/10

原作者：旅途

header:
<js>
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "Accept-Language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en;q=0.8,en-GB;q=0.7,en-US;q=0.6",
    "token": cache.get("uaaToken") || '',
    "Cookie": cache.get("uaaCookie") || ''
}
cache.put("uaaheaders",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: text.作者：@text##作者：
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
sleep(Math.random() * 1000);
while (cache.get('uaasxlock')) {}
cache.put('uaasxlock',1,10);
var BUrl = String(/http/.test(baseUrl) ? baseUrl : `${java.hexDecodeToString(result)}`);
java.put('BUrl', BUrl);
var novelId = BUrl.replace(/.*id=/,'');
var infomap = source.getLoginInfoMap() || {};
var score = infomap['评分：'] || '';
if (/\d+/.test(score) && 0 < parseInt(score) <= 5) {
    var text = '';
    try {
        text = java.getVerificationCode('http://qyyuapi.com/img/' + score + '.png');
    } catch {}
    if (text !== '') {
        var url = BUrl.replace(/novel.*$/, 'api/novel/app/novel/user/comment/add');
        var headers = JSON.parse(cache.get("uaaheaders"));
        var requestBody = 'novelId=' + novelId + '&chapterId=0&content=' + text + '&score=' + (parseInt(score) * 2);
        var option = {
            "method": "POST",
            "body": String(requestBody),
            "headers": headers
        };
        var Url = url + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
        Response = java.ajax(Url);
        if (JSON.parse(Response).result == 'success') {
            java.longToast('\n\n❤️评论成功❤️');
        } else {
            java.longToast('\n\n♣️评论失败♣️');
        }
    }
    infomap['评分：'] = '';
    source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(infomap));
}
book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(BUrl)},{"type":"uaabook"}`;
result = java.ajax(BUrl);
if (result.match(/no-js/)) {
    java.webView("", Url("源站："), "");
    result = java.ajax(BUrl);
}
java.setContent(result);
var last = "";
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = result.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(result.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    last = String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, "");
}
java.put('last',last);
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
sleep(Math.random() * 1000);
while (cache.get('uaazwlock')) {}
cache.put('uaazwlock',1,10);
let URL = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
result = java.ajax(URL);
java.setContent(result);
if (result.includes("no-js")) {
    for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        try {
            sleep(Math.random() * 500);
            if (!cache.get("uaalock")) {
                cache.put("uaalock", 1, 60);
                result = java.webView("", URL, "");
                if (result.includes("no-js")) {
                    cookie.removeCookie(URL);
                    result = java.startBrowserAwait(URL, "验证").body();
                }
                cache.delete("uaalock");
            }
        } catch {
            cache.delete("uaalock");
            continue;
        }
        while (cache.get("uaalock")) {}
        if (!result.includes("no-js")) {
            break;
        }
    }
}
if (/内容已隐藏|请访问源网站/.test(result)) {
    for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        if (java.getElements(".article").attr("code") == "478") {
            try {
                sleep(Math.random() * 500);
                if (!cache.get("uaacodelock")) {
                    cache.put("uaacodelock", 1, 60);
                    var Code = java.getVerificationCode(Url("源站：") + '/captcha,{"headers":' + cache.get("uaaheaders") + ',"method": "GET"}');
                    var requestBody = "checkCode=" + Code;
                    var headers = JSON.parse(cache.get("uaaheaders"));
                    var option = {
                        method: "POST",
                        body: String(requestBody),
                        headers: headers
                    };
                    java.ajax(Url("源站：") + "/checkLimitCode," + JSON.stringify(option));
                    cache.delete("uaacodelock");
                }
            } catch {
                cache.delete("uaacodelock");
                continue;
            }
            while (cache.get("uaacodelock")) {}
            result = java.ajax(URL + ',{"headers":' + cache.get("uaaheaders") + ',"method": "GET"}');
        } else {
            cookie.removeCookie(Url("源站："));
            result = java.ajax(URL + ',{"headers":' + cache.get("uaaheaders") + ',"method": "GET"}');
        }
        if (!/内容已隐藏|请访问源网站/.test(result)) {
            break;
        }
    }
}
sleep(T1);
cache.delete('uaazwlock');
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
result = J.select('.article').html();
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
(function (e) {
    return `{{Url("源站：") + Path}}/search?{{     
       //多选标签
        let a = "keyword="+key.replace(/@@/g, '&includeTags=')
        //屏蔽标签
        .replace(/##/g, '&excludeTags=')
        //随意中英文逗号分隔标签
        .replace(/，/g,",");        
        a;
    }}&space={{Get('p')}}&source={{Get('q')}}&finished={{get('finished',Get('o'))}}&orderType={{Get('r')}}&person={{get('person',Get('s'))}}&porn={{get('porn',Get('t'))}}&orientation={{get('orientation',Get('u'))}}&period={{get('period',Get('v'))}}&score={{get('score',Get('w'))}}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
}(key));
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.请使用3.25发布版阅读app
2.由于网站有验证机制，请将更多设置里的预下载设置为0，不要一次性缓存过多章节
3.需要登录，各个域名登录状态相互独立
4.可在登录ui界面查看当前使用域名与登录状态，可切换域名、测试延迟
5.请不要更改源域名，会使已缓存小说丢失
6.可通过登录UI验证
7.防倒卖，请在登录UI界面输入作者名：tlyanyu

var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
}
else{
newUrl = Get("url") + chapter.url;
chapter.baseUrl = newUrl;
html = java.ajax(newUrl);
document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){

}
}
</js>

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';

function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();

    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");

}

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let key = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (key) {
            let keyParts = key.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                key = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', key);
                return key;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let keys = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!keys) {
	keys = gets_key();
	}

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

// 合并数据

function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",

            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1

        datas.push({
            "title": '༺༴ '+k1+' ༴༻',

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}
// 地区分类

    "国漫": "cn",

let datas = [{
    "title": "全部分类",
    "url": base_url+"/discover?page={{page}}&bztype=all&region=all&state=all&bzfilter=%2a",
    "style": {
        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.2
    }
}];

for (let bztype_k in bztypes) {
    let bztype_v = bztypes[bztype_k];

    let data = {
        "title": '༺༴ '+bztype_k+' ༴༻',
        "url": `${base_url}/discover?page={{page}}&bztype=${bztype_v}&region=all&state=all&bzfilter=%2a`,
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    };
    datas.push(data);

    for (let region_k in regions) {
        let region_v = regions[region_k];
        data = {
            "title": region_k,
            "url": `${base_url}/discover?page={{page}}&bztype=${bztype_v}&region=${region_v}&state=all&bzfilter=%2a`,
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.2
            }
        };
        datas.push(data);
    }
}
